sentences.sentence: The last time I walked this world, it was buggies and Model Ts.
sentences.translation: 上次我来这个世界的时候，用的是儿童车和老爷车。

sentences.sentence: Sam entered a world of iceboxes, horse-drawn buggies and, commonly, outhouses.
sentences.translation: 山姆进入一个世界是有冰箱，马拉手推车或更普通的外围建筑的世界。

sentences.sentence: The duo hope their journey will establish "kite-buggies" as a new means for exploring polar regions.
sentences.translation: 他二人希望这次旅行能够开创“风筝车”这种探索极地的新方式。
